name: Animal Bubble: Pop Ball Color
description:
Animal Bubble is based on the traditional bubble dragon game while created with a special Challenge Boss mode. Speed and fury, you deserve it.
Features:
*Four Modes: Classic, Rescue, Boss and Challenge.
*100+ levels to satisfy all your desires.
*Delicate themes and design, the lovely pets and roles will totally get you hypnotized.
*Build your own castle and decorate it with diverse modelling.
*Compete with your friends for your sense of achievement.
*Numerous boosters will help you out.
